data.title: SLA Industries 2nd Edition: CULT
data.meta_description: New source material for SLA Industries, the 'cult' splatterpunk, corporate horror tabletop roleplaying game (RPG) by Nightfall Games
data.text:
(loading your very own snazzy kicktraq chart)

Now you can share!

Help your backers reach your daily goals and help others see how you're doing. It's easy, with Kicktraq Mini.

Here are a few quick snippits of code you can use to embed your personalized widget on your website, in your blog, and even on your favorite forum.

HTML for websites & blogs

Copy HTML

BBCode for forums

Copy BBCode

Reddit code for... well, Reddit

Copy Reddit Code

Special Note: Kickstarter recently disabled remote embedding for images on project pages, so embedding code doesn't work on project pages (yet) - just everywhere else.

You can read more about it here.

July 4th - via: kickstarter.com

Wow what a ride. Thank you all for your support! Nightfall Games are honoured by the support for SLA Industries. We will, as ever, endeavour to exceed all expectation for you all! We didn't quite make it to Deth's Door, but I suspect there's life... (Read More)

July 4th - via: kickstarter.com

As this campaign comes to an end and starts to knock on 'Deth's Door', it is time for 2 last stretch goals: Firstly, we have new rules for acquiring new second-hand vehicles. Being SLA, you can bet your bottom Uni that the finance deals are amazing!... (Read More)

July 2nd - via: kickstarter.com

A number of people have been asking for a pledge level which includes all the new items created for this campaign...this is it: Included here are all the book cover variants, the new BPN coins, the player's dossier and the weapons deck. It's a... (Read More)

June 29th - via: kickstarter.com

Now its time for the (faux) leather covers:As previous backers will know, we always launch a special leather edition cover for the 'main book' of a campaign when we know we have hit critical mass. Now is critical mass time... BUT... Because the... (Read More)

June 25th - via: kickstarter.com

The new old species for SLA IndustriesAstute observers would have seen hints of the Omaja throughout the publishing history of SLA Industries. Omaja, originally pejoratively referred to as Trenchers, are a species that was planned for the very first... (Read More)

June 23rd - via: kickstarter.com

Today we are excited to be in a position to release our Spot UV Kickstarter Exclusive and Limited Edition versions of both CULT and the Operative's HandbookLimited Edition and Kickstarter Exclusive Cover Variants:Bothe the Operative's Handbook and... (Read More)
